name: Migrate from SQLite to MongoDB
description: Remove all SQLite usage and fully migrate to MongoDB (furdb). Replace connection logic, queries, and data access patterns.

tasks.title: Remove SQLite dependency
tasks.description: Delete all `sqlite3` imports and remove any use of `get_db_connection()`.

tasks.title: Create mongo_service.py
tasks.description: Implement a centralized connection handler using pymongo and expose `get_collection(name)`.

tasks.title: Replace SQL queries with PyMongo
tasks.description: Replace SELECT/INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE SQL statements with PyMongo equivalents (find, insert_one, update_one, delete_one).

tasks.title: Update all routes and cogs to use Mongo
tasks.description: Ensure all Flask routes and Discord cogs use the new MongoDB connection structure.

tasks.title: Add MongoDB error handling
tasks.description: Add basic exception handling and logging for all MongoDB interactions.

tasks.title: Verify collections
tasks.description: Ensure that the following collections exist: `users`, `events`, `reminders`, `event_participants`, `hall_of_fame`.
